thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: News Editor/Booker - Sports Media

title: News Editor/Booker - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. ™ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: News Editor/Booker Posted/Updated: 10-09-2015 Brief Job Description: Assist producer research and book guests for Matt Adams Fairways of Life radio show. Vet the Morning Drive daily show rundown with producers, pitch potential topics and pertinent guests   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
